title: Disabling "Saving connections on exit" doesn't work
author: gonepaper
body_snippet:
Hello,

Version : MremoteNG  1.76.11.40527

Impact: when disabling "saving connections on exit", it still save connections.
Is this normal?

Thank you.
Gone.

iterations.description: User setting to disable saving connections on exit is ignored — the save logic runs unconditionally on app close instead of checking the option flag.

notes:
AI triage (claude): User setting to disable saving connections on exit is ignored — the save logic runs unconditionally on app close instead of checking the option flag.
Approach: In the FormClosing/exit handler, wrap the connections-save call with a check against the 'Save connections on exit' setting (e.g. `if (Settings.Default.SaveConnectionsOnExit)`) before invoking the serializer/save routine.
